storyInfo:
The Yeti Squad has been buried within Lungmen, and the city is safe once again.
But the conversation that Kal'tsit had with the Doctor, and the words that FrostNova uttered upon waking up, suggest that the matter is not over yet.

attributes.content: The... the Yetis...
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: ...I feel so bad for them to all die in Lungmen like that. One less hope, one less legend for the Infected.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Move it. The L. G. D. are on the way.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: ...There's something not quite right about your eyes.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: To be honest, I always thought you were a spy for Lungmen.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: How about now?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: No one would believe it anyway.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: A real spy would kill you to keep you quiet.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: I'm not worried about you killing me. Look at the state of Lungmen. Even if you were a Lungmenite, you can't go back.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: You'd have an even worse time than we did.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: ...So I'm not. I'm not really anything anymore.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: What are you doing? Wow, is that a flower?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Oooh, is this your Arts? It's pretty.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Someone has to leave them a token of respect.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Such dilly-dallying... such a waste of time.
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: I think it was well done. I can give top marks for wiping out the entire Reunion Movement in the city of Lungmen in a single day.
Wei Yenwu is impressive.
Taihe, have you heard that rumor?
You speak of Wei Yenwu's history?
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Delve not into such things.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Forgive me. But how do the skills of the Black Cloaks compare to those of the Imperial Guard?
Hmph. You overestimate them. But they do indeed have some exceptional skill...
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Look out!
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: You bastards!!!
——Infected?
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Hiss!
——Wire?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You don't really want to kill me, do you? You can use Arts.
I've always heard that men who use wires as weapons are all, literally all, psychopaths.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Indeed, they do say that...
Infected, do not interfere with official business. Take care that I lump you in with the others.
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Not much to be done about unidentified armed units getting killed on the battlefield, is there?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We can likewise testify that you are acting in coordination with Reunion.
You don't have the authority to investigate my partner.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We are well aware that a vessel belonging to an 'Infected Countermeasures Specialist' is docked in a Lungmen berth, Superintendent Ch'en. This is the only reason Miss Blaze has not yet come to harm.
Then how much more do you need to see? How much more must you test the people of this city with their very lives?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Speak with respect. We are assessing Lungmen's risk control capabilities due to the importance with which we regard you.
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Then forgive me. I'll rephrase.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Are you enjoying this farce?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Pfft.
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Stand down, Blaze. We do not serve these fine, upstanding individuals, and they're not with the raincoats either.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Apologies, Miss Blaze. I hope I did not cause you any displeasure.
...You're very polite. But your tone pisses me off.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You have an ear for Yen speech.
You inherited much from your father. Alas, now you are but an Infected. Your path is rough. And short.
Come.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Goodbye then, Miss Blaze, Superintendent Ch'en.
Wait! What did you just say about my dad?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Stop!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Remember the mission!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We found no trace of the enemy commander.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Which?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We only know of Mephisto.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Let Rhodes Island handle the rest.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No need to rush into it. This campaign is all but over.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But he has to pay... for the atrocities he committed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then we'll leave it to you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Let's part ways for now. I have one more thing I need to see with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wait a minute, L. G. D. lady.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Thanks for that, back there.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That's all.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Sure. You too.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Why did you have to pick that moment to act? Blaze... You're not the type to make mistakes at a time like this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: For one thing, I was really mad...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: For another, I could tell that L. G. D. lady, Ch'en, was getting mad too.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We also can't tell which of the two sides has the right to speak.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So I pick the one I like.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Sorry. It won't happen again.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...No, Blaze. It's my turn to say it won't happen again.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I can't say that. I can't promise that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Yetis...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Silly rabbit.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey, don't pat my head. I need to get taller...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...At least, don't pat it too long.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know, I know.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: How do you feel?
I was in the neighborhood.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your emotional state is fluctuating. It seems you had a deeper interaction with this Reunion unit in the Chernobog ruins.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As far as I can tell, the captain of this unit did not participate in the battle.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Lungmen won't keep chasing these Infected. But Rhodes Island has to do more.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Lungmen won't interfere with what happens next. And you can choose not to participate.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...But you will participate. Whether the Infected is codenamed 'Mephisto' or 'FrostNova.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have my work cut out for me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh, and Dr. {@nickname}......
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't look at me like that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Stop with the cloak and dagger.;......;Amiya said Rhodes Island needs trust.

attributes.content: But you and I don't need trust.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You need the trust of Rhodes Island's operators, not me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ——I know you too well to trust you. Just like you never trusted me, in the old days.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: How would I know the old days?;The old days?;Is there anything I can do about it now?

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I misspoke. Forget it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Be careful in the next operation. Only the most dangerous of commanders would train such a squad of Infected who would fight to the death without flinching.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Of course, it's up to you if you want to see it through to the end.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And do conserve your energy. We may not have time to rest.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: The battle for Lungmen is over.

attributes.content: It's not that simple. At least, that's what I think.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, from now on, it's up to you to decide if you will shoulder the burden of responsibility for Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...'Whether or not to be one worthy of the trust of a Rhodes Island operator.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah, FrostNova, ma'am, you're awake...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: ...Take it easy! Let me help you.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: I'm fine. I'm not... so fragile.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Where are you going? You can't go back.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Then, my brothers and sisters...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...You can't go back!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: It was for your sake that they...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Don't insult my squad!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Ugh!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: They did... *cough* look out for me.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But it was for the Infected that they gave their lives so bravely!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: They fought their last battle so that more of their people could live, not for the sake of any one person!
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough hack* *cough*...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: *Cough* Guh... Mmg...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova, ma'am...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Enough with the ma'am. Are you calling me that because I look weak to you?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Sorry!
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: It's just, they put you in our care like this.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: And now they're gone, and I never got to keep my promises to them.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I don't even have a chance to make amends.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: ...The one slumped at the wall there.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Mephisto.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: He's still unconscious?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: We don't know. He's been like that the whole time. He says nothing. Does nothing.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Take him back. It's enough.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Understood. Phew, I thought you'd...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: I'd what?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I thought you'd kill him.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: There's no need for that anymore. I think I know what happened outside the slums.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: That disheartened look in his eyes...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...And, from time to time...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I recall that day, three or four years ago, when he tried his very hardest to sing.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: He can sing? But Faust said, his throat...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: He really tried.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Just like all of us Infected. Though we will all someday succumb to Oripathy...
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: We still try our very hardest to live.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Let the rest of his life continue to punish him.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Tell me, Phantom Crossbowman, was Rhodes Island involved in that fight?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Do you mean...?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: ...No, as far as I know, they didn't fight the Yetis.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: ...So childish.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Are you sure you want to stay?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: They may not come after us, FrostNova. You don't have to die here.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: I met a few people in the ruins. I want to see them again.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I promised them, actually.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: And I know they're coming.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: FrostNova...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Go on, brother.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Reunion lost this battle. And just maybe, Reunion did wrong.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: But you haven't. You still have a choice, you can do better.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Go on. And don't look back.
attributes.name: FrostNova
